alert.note: Alert for DeKalb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:47PM EDT until August 12 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DEKALB...FAYETTE...NORTHEASTERN COWETA...SOUTH CENTRAL FULTON AND CLAYTON COUNTIES... At 447 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from College Park to Peachtree City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, City of South Fulton, Peachtree City, East Point, Union City, Forest Park, Riverdale, College Park, Fairburn, Tyrone, Morrow, Hapeville, Senoia, Lake City, Brooks, Woolsey, Belvedere Park, and Hartsfield-Jackson Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
